snippet: Despite a recent thaw in relations, the United States placed a senior Burmese general on its sanctions list on Tuesday.
abstract: United States places senior Burmese general Thein Htay on its sanctions list, accusing him of buying military equipment from North Korea in defiance of international sanctions.
lead_paragraph: Despite a recent thaw in relations, the United States placed a senior Burmese general on its sanctions list on Tuesday.

headline.main: Myanmar: General Lands on American Sanctions List
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: General Lands On American Sanctions List
